attributes.action: stop the high tarrifs imposed on water meter custormers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who moves house or lives in a house built after 1991 will also be feeling the financial burden placed on families with a mandatory water meter fitted. They are unwanted yet forced upon us and costs a family of 3 and above far more than it would cost a family of 3 or above if they didn't have a meter. They are unfair at the current cost per liter and changes need to be made.
